courses.title: Fundamentals of Computer Science
courses.description: This course offers you an in-depth description of the basic workings of Computer Science.

courses.title: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: A beginner's course in programming, covering the basics of syntax and logic.

courses.title: Web Development Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create interactive web pages.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: A deep dive into the world of data structures and algorithms for optimizing your code.

courses.title: Machine Learning Basics
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Learn how to create mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms.

courses.title: Cloud Computing
courses.description: Gain an understanding of cloud services and how to deploy applications on the cloud.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding cybersecurity principles and practices.

courses.title: Database Management Systems
courses.description: Learn how to design, implement, and manage databases using popular systems like MySQL and MongoDB.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Dive into AI concepts and techniques, including neural networks and natural language processing.
